attributes.action: Get rid of Social Care Services and replace it with a more competent agency
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Social Care Services across the country regularly fail children, young people and adults on a daily basis.

Unfortunately, the success stories still don't outweigh the stories of failure. We say replace Social Care Services across the country with a competent national government agency for the protection of children, young people and adults which answers to a independent agency.
